column5: Hope you enjoy this serene condo on the river, with a pool and hot tub at your back door.   It is a 2 bedroom, 2 bath space with plenty of living area. Sleeps 7. The master has a King size bed and twin futon, 2nd bedroom has two twin beds, and there is a queen size sleeper sofa in the living.   Kitchen is fully stocked with cookware.   We are close to Schlitterbahn, Gruene, and tubing. Easy access to Outlet malls, Austin and San Antonio.
